title: Kick-off
description: Wayne Barnes blows his whistle and Dan Biggar gets us underway

title: Penalty
description: 35m out and pretty much dead in front

title: Penalty
description: Just inside the 22 about 10m to the right of the posts. Halfpenny slots it in

title: Penalty
description: Dead on halfway and dead centre. Leigh Halfpenny extends the lead

title: Penalty
description: 38m out and just to the left. Ireland have a problem now

title: Penalty
description: Sexton from 4m inside the Welsh half 15m in from the right lands an excellent kick

title: Drop-goal
description: Eventually it goes back and Biggar nails the perfect drop-goal from 40m!

title: Half-time
description: Free-kick to Wales at the scrum and Biggar boots it out to end the half

title: Try!
description: Scott Williams comes from deep cuts a marvellous line inside of Bowe and goes over!

title: Penalty try!
description: Down comes the maul and Wayne Barnes goes straight under the posts! Sexton converts.

title: Full-time
description: Wales get the penalty from a collapsed scrum and kick it out!
